text.section: Promptly upon the filing of a petition with an election authority, the chief election official of the election authority shall review the petition.

Unless a determination of deficiency is made under subsection (c) of this section, the chief election official shall:
make a determination that the petition, as to matters other than the validity of signatures, is sufficient; or
defer a determination of sufficiency pending further review.
A determination under this section may not be inconsistent with an advance determination made under § 6-202 of this subtitle.
Notice of a determination under this section shall be provided in accordance with § 6-210 of this subtitle.
